products.mainCategory: AI & Digital Intelligence
products.subCategory: Industry-specific AI Applications
products.name: Amfibian (Semiconductor Manufacturing Process Control Platform)
products.detail:
Amfibian‚Ñ¢ is an on-premise AI process control platform that predicts process conditions and derives optimal recipe and control parameters based on semiconductor mass-production data.

Its key differentiator is that process engineers‚Äîwithout relying on developers or data scientists‚Äîcan directly create, modify, validate, and deploy models. An intuitive model-building framework combined with a digital twin‚Äìbased pre-validation system enables scenario testing and risk assessment before deployment. In operation, the platform provides stabilization features including monitoring and rollback.

By integrating equipment, metrology, and historical data, Amfibian performs virtual metrology (VM) and control optimization, delivering not only diagnostics but also concrete adjustment guidance. Designed as an add-on to existing MES and APC environments, it allows rapid deployment and is scalable from CMP to a wide range of semiconductor processes.

products.name: SNOK CHAIR (Massage Chair)
products.detail:
SNOK Chair

The Good Sleep Electric Swing Massage Chair that understands your body and delivers true rest.

The SNOK Chair by INNOVM redefines the concept of a massage chair.
Moving beyond conventional designs focused on intense muscle stimulation, SNOK is thoughtfully engineered around the essence of rest and sleep ‚Äî creating a new category of healing chair.

Sound therapy and melatonin-inspired ambient lighting gently ease physical and mental tension, while the rhythmic electric swing motion guides the body into a naturally deep state of relaxation.

Its smart sensing system monitors heart rate and oxygen saturation, automatically adjusting swing speed and massage intensity according to the user‚Äôs condition. The electric zero-gravity reclining system, extending up to 150¬∞, minimizes pressure on the spine and joints to create the most comfortable resting posture.

With intuitive smartphone app connectivity for seamless control, and a refined minimalist design that harmonizes with living rooms, studies, or bedrooms, SNOK enhances both wellness and interior elegance.

The SNOK Chair is a premium healing solution that balances technology, design, and restorative comfort ‚Äî bringing deep, complete relaxation into modern urban life.

SNOK is a combination of Sleep and Nook, symbolizing a personal and cozy space dedicated to rest.

Key Features
Electric Swing Therapy
A smooth, rhythmic swing motion that relieves tension and promotes emotional and physical stability.

Smart Sensing System
Detects heart rate and oxygen saturation to automatically adjust swing speed and massage intensity in real time.

Zero-Gravity Reclining Structure
Up to 150¬∞ electric recline to reduce spinal and joint pressure for optimal relaxation posture.

Air ¬∑ Vibration ¬∑ Heat Massage
Provides gentle, non-aggressive full-body relaxation without harsh mechanical impact.

Lumbar Airbag Stretching
Gently supports and stretches the lower back for natural tension relief.

Sound Therapy & Melatonin Light
Creates a sleep-friendly environment that supports deeper relaxation.

App-Connected Healing Curation
Easily access curated rest and sleep programs through a dedicated mobile app.

Ergonomic Design
Engineered to accommodate various body types with stable and comfortable seating.

Premium Minimalist Aesthetic
A refined object-style design that complements any interior space.

The SNOK Chair is more than a massage device ‚Äî
it is a smart wellness solution that elevates the quality of rest to the next level.

companies.name: PIASPACE
companies.businessArea: Manufacturer / In-house Technology Developer

products.mainCategory: AI & Digital Intelligence, Smart Life & Data Tech
products.subCategory: Multimodal AI, Industry-specific AI Applications, Smart Home/Office/Work Solutions
products.name: MACS(Multi-modal AI for Camera Solution)
products.detail:
MACS: Context-Aware Intelligent Video Analytics

MACS is an advanced, multi-modal AI-driven CCTV analysis system that goes beyond simple object detection to understand situational context and detect complex anomalies in real-time.

The core strength of MACS lies in its "human-like" contextual understanding. While traditional AI focuses on identifying objects, MACS interprets the meaning behind actions‚Äîsuch as "a person collapsing" or "a motorcycle operating without a helmet." This is achieved through sophisticated Vision-Language Model (VLM) technology, which analyzes video and text data simultaneously.

Unlike conventional detection systems, MACS utilizes VLM to enable complex situational awareness even with minimal training data. Furthermore, our lightweight architecture allows for more CCTV channels per GPU, offering superior scalability and cost-efficiency.

MACS features real-time threat detection and instant alerts, enabling immediate response to emergencies. Our technology is certified by major Korean authorities (KISA, KTL), boasting an F1-score of over 96 and a detection accuracy of 90%+ in complex environments.

From falls and fires to trespassing and crowd density, MACS provides flexible detection types tailored to your needs. It is the ideal solution for urban surveillance, industrial sites, ports, airports, and luxury resorts.

companies.name: Rendezvue
companies.businessArea: Development of AI Solutions for Procurement Automation

products.mainCategory: Robotics & Intelligent Mobility
products.subCategory: Industrial/Logistics/Service Robots, Autonomous Driving
products.name: Autonomous Greenhouse Spray Automation Robot with Self-Driving Navigation
products.detail: FARMILY-X S300 is an autonomous greenhouse spraying robot designed to fully automate repetitive crop protection tasks through precision self-driving navigation. By accurately recognizing greenhouse rail systems and predefined routes, it delivers consistent and uniform spraying performance while minimizing variability caused by manual operation. The robot operates safely in unmanned and nighttime conditions, significantly reducing labor dependency and improving operational efficiency. Equipped with human-detection safety features, it automatically stops when workers are detected to ensure a safe working environment. In addition, the system records detailed spraying data, including operation time, coverage area, and chemical usage, enabling data-driven farm management. More than just a spraying device, the FARMILY-X S300 represents a smart automation solution that enhances productivity, safety, and sustainability in modern greenhouse farming.

products.name: FARMILY-X UV (Autonomous Greenhouse UV-C Crop Protection Robot)
products.detail: FARMILY-X UV is an autonomous greenhouse robot specifically designed to safely utilize UV-C technology for unmanned crop protection. Because UV-C exposure can be harmful to humans, its application requires a fully unmanned and precisely controlled environment. FARMILY-X UV addresses this challenge through advanced self-driving navigation, enabling safe nighttime and off-hour operation without human presence. Equipped with human-detection safety systems, the robot automatically stops when workers are detected, ensuring operational safety. Its precision motion control delivers uniform and controlled UV-C exposure only where needed, minimizing the risk of crop damage from overexposure. By reducing dependency on chemical pesticides and enabling consistent, repeatable treatment, FARMILY-X UV provides a sustainable and intelligent automation solution for modern greenhouse farming.

products.name: eyeCloudXOAR(SIEM&SOAR)
products.detail:
eyeCloudXOAR is an integrated security data analytics and response automation platform (SIEM & SOAR).

The solution collects, stores, normalizes, and analyzes all text-based logs generated across on-premises and cloud environments, enabling real-time threat detection and automated incident response.

It supports real-time search and analysis even in TB-scale data environments, leveraging distributed processing and clustering technology for linear scalability. The platform has been field-proven in over 600 deployments, including government and financial institutions.

Through its SOAR capabilities, eyeCloudXOAR provides over 80 integration components and playbook-based automated response workflows. A GUI-based configuration environment ensures operational efficiency and flexibility.

With a perpetual licensing policy and a flexible hybrid architecture (Private Cloud / Public Cloud / On-Premises), the platform minimizes long-term operational costs while maximizing scalability and performance.
certifications:

ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Certified (Information Security Management System)  
GS (Good Software) Certification ‚Äì Republic of Korea

products.mainCategory: Smart Life & Data Tech

products.name: Two way wireless voice communication device(Full-duplex intercom)
products.detail:
Our main products WiWi, a portable two-way wireless transceiver based on frequency. It is small and light, so hands-free anytime, anywhere, and communication with each other is possible only with products without a separate repeater. It is a self-developed product that can provide customized software according to the user's purpose, such as one-way, two-way, simultaneous interpretation, and sports judgment, so customer satisfaction is high.

WiWi is a portable two-way wireless transceiver operating in unlicensed frequency bands (2.4GHz / 900MHz). Compact and lightweight, it provides hands-free communication anytime, anywhere, without a repeater. The system supports up to 6 users in simultaneous conversation, making it ideal for real-time collaboration. Used by sports referees, factory workers, and logistics teams, WiWi delivers clear, reliable, and efficient group communication across diverse environments.

1. Product Advantages
‚óè There is no extra charge for digital wireless transceiver based on frequency.
‚óè No interference between channels; supports up to 40 broad channels.
‚óè Up to 6 people per channel can communicate at the same time.
‚óè It is small and light, so it is easy to use for a long time.
‚óè Excellent dustproof/waterproof durability at IP54 level.
‚óè Consumer satisfaction is high because the program can be modified according to the environment and purpose of use, such as one-way, two-way, and speech fixing.
‚óè Bluetooth chip enables complete wireless communication and develops its own Bluetooth earset for the best wireless sound quality. 
‚óè Implement noise cancelling to suppress ambient noise and support clear sound quality.

2. Product Application 
‚óè Tour Guide and VIP Line Tour
‚óè Power Kickboards and Smart Mobility 
‚óè Simultaneous interpretation system and event events 
‚óè Sports referee communication 
‚óè Intercom for broadcasting filming  
‚óè Military firing training ground and small squad training 
‚óè Drone shooting communication 
‚óè For other services and business purposes

3. Product Characterstic
‚óè Two-way radio transmission and reception based on 2.4 GHz, 900 MHz, 800 MHz, 400 MHz
‚óè Disconnect the product transmission and receiver using a simple operation method. (Master/Slave mode) 
‚óè Supports up to 40 channels 
‚óè The number of people in all groups can be communicated sequentially (up to 6 people can make simultaneous calls)  
‚óè 1:1 maximum communication distance: 500 m 
‚óè Charging / hours used: 3 hours / 10 hours
‚óè Wireless microphone system is possible through speaker interworking 
‚óè Built-in speaker / Bluetooth headset compatible 
‚óè Communication distance can be extended through a separate relay terminal 
‚óè Support customized S/W firmware

4. Product excellence and differentiation 
‚óè Advanced encryption standard for AES256 does not allow eavesdropping
‚óè Support real-time multi-way two-way communication and send and receive all personnel sequentially 
‚óè Wired earphones must be used for competitors' terminals, but WiWi can communicate 100% wirelessly through Bluetooth earphone compatible technology.
‚óè In case of loss or damage of earphones, built-in speakers and microphones can be used 
‚óè Mounted noise cancelling chip to suppress ambient noise 
‚óè To overcome the weak communication distance as a small output communication product, develop the communication between barriers or floors through the development of wired and wireless relay devices. 
‚óè Support consumer-tailored software firmware through an affiliated lab to differentiate itself from competitors

products.name: Magconn Technology
products.detail:
Magconn technology is magnetic wireless charging & data sync solution and it can be applied for all the mobile devices and accessories. 

Magconn is same as USB in terms of function (power & data), but the UI (user interface) is different.
Conventional USB interface is plug-in/plug-out, but Magconn is simply attach/detach.

Magconn technology has been applied for Smartphone, Tablet PC, Action camera, Bike light & GPS Tracker, mPOS, Barcode/RFID reader, Medical device, iPhone & Android phone cases and accessories, Automotive accessories, etc. in global market

companies.name: Storagean
companies.businessArea: Development of AI Solutions for Procurement Automation

products.mainCategory: Smart Life & Data Tech
products.subCategory: Data Security, Privacy Protection, AI Security
products.name: SecuDongle - Mobile Network Edition / Standard Edition
products.detail:
üî∑ MAIN PRODUCTS 
SecuDongle PNS & BNAB (Hardware-Based Physical Network Segregation Platform)
SecuDongle enables a single PC to operate across different security-classified networks while maintaining strict physical separation through PNS (Physical Network Segregation).
With BNAB (Block Network After Browsing), the network remains disconnected by default and is automatically activated only when a user initiates an application requiring connectivity; once the requested web session is displayed on the user‚Äôs screen, the connection is physically blocked again.
By combining PNS and BNAB, SecuDongle not only isolates networks with different security levels, but also minimizes exposure within each isolated domain. This dual-layer architecture reduces persistent connectivity and significantly limits the attack surface across all segregated environments ‚Äî without requiring multiple terminals or complex network infrastructure.

üî∑ PRODUCT BRIEFS 
SecuDongle ‚Äì Mobile Network Edition
A compact BNAB-based security device tailored for mobile and personal secure computing.
Enables hardware-level network isolation without requiring additional infrastructure.
Well-suited for remote professionals and controlled on-demand internet access.
Includes optional control over wireless interfaces such as WiFi and Bluetooth to reduce unintended connectivity paths

SecuDongle ‚Äì Standard Edition
A robust hardware-enforced solution engineered for enterprise environments requiring strict network domain separation.
Supports multi-device and multi-VM mapping within a single PC architecture to meet higher assurance demands.
Designed for secure endpoint environments that must operate across distinct security domains without cross-network exposure.

üî∑ DIFFERENTIATION 
Unlike conventional software-based isolation, SecuDongle enforces event-driven, hardware-level physical network segregation.
‚Ä¢ Enforces default network disconnection at the device level
‚Ä¢ Activates connections only when explicitly required
‚Ä¢ Automatically revokes network access after task completion
‚Ä¢ Prevents unintended cross-network exposure
‚Ä¢ Supports multi-device and multi-VM mapping on a single PC
‚Ä¢ Enables operation across networks with different security classifications
‚Ä¢ Eliminates always-on connectivity risks
‚Ä¢ Provides deterministic and auditable enforcement
‚Ä¢ Delivers hardware-based assurance beyond firewall or VM-only approaches

products.name: TERASO Hi-Flex Cables (High-Performance Servo & System Control Cables)
products.detail:
TERASO‚Äôs High-Performance Servo Cables provide optimized connectivity solutions for industrial robots, CNC machinery, and automated production lines requiring precision control.

 1. Exceptional Flexibility & Durability: Engineered for high-flexibility, our cables have passed millions of bending and torsion cycles, ensuring stable power and signal delivery even in high-speed articulated robots and cleanroom environments.

 2. Advanced Signal Protection (EMC): Featuring high-density tinned copper braided shielding, our cables effectively block electromagnetic interference (EMI), ensuring error-free data transmission and precise motor synchronization.

 3. Environmental Resilience: To withstand harsh industrial conditions, the cables are jacketed with oil-resistant, chemical-resistant, and flame-retardant materials (compliant with UL/CE standards), significantly extending their service life.

 4. Customized Solutions: We offer a wide range of specifications and professional harness assembly services tailored to customer equipment requirements, ensuring seamless integration and easy installation.
